title: 5% Potion XP Hopeport
content:
5% XP Hopeport is an item that can be used to boost the player's XP gain in Hopeport. It is created using the Alchemist profession by combining a bottle with 5% Preparation XP Hopeport. The 5% Preparation XP Hopeport is created by combining White Periwinkle and Horn Shell at a Reagent Preparation Station.

The XP Boost does apply to the Knowledge XP Reward.

If the XP Boost runs outs while in the middle a task that would give XP, it does not effect the XP gained from finishing the task.
